solution_line_template: There are {side_one_songs}+{side_two_songs}=<<{side_one_songs}+{side_two_songs}={total_songs}>>{total_songs} songs on the tape.
In total, the time is {total_songs}*{song_duration_minutes}=<<{total_songs}*{song_duration_minutes}={total_tape_length}>>{total_tape_length} minutes.
